${ModID}:PaceChaser.NAME: Pace Chaser

${ModID}:FrontRunner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Deal !D! damage X times, where X is the drawn card's cost. NL (0-cost and Unplayable count as 1.)

I'm not getting into the water!
My arms! My poor, poor arms!
I don't care if it's better, I'm still not training Guts!
Studying is boring, I'd rather run!

${ModID}:SpeedEater.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. Exhaust all umapyoi:non-Uma cards in your hand and gain !M! Vigor for every card exhausted.

${ModID}:TriumphantPulse.NAME: Triumphant Pulse
${ModID}:TriumphantPulse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a copy of this card to your hand. This card's cost cannot be modified. Exhaust.

${ModID}:OpeningGambit.NAME: Opening Gambit
${ModID}:OpeningGambit.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and reduce their Strength by !M!. Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShiftingGears.NAME: Shifting Gears
${ModID}:ShiftingGears.DESCRIPTION: Convert half your Vigor to Strength. Exhaust.
${ModID}:ShiftingGears.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert half your Vigor to Strength.

${ModID}:MasterfulGambit.NAME: Masterful Gambit
${ModID}:MasterfulGambit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Vigor for every !M! % HP missing from the enemy.

${ModID}:Unruffled.NAME: Unruffled
${ModID}:Unruffled.DESCRIPTION: Choose to add an *Impervious, *Spirit *Shield, or *Buffer to your hand. Exhaust.

${ModID}:UmaStan.NAME: Uma Stan
${ModID}:UmaStan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If there is a umapyoi:non-Uma card in your hand, improve your umapyoi:Mood by 1.

${ModID}:WhiteLightning.NAME: White Lightning
${ModID}:WhiteLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. This does not consume Vigor.

${ModID}:LateStartStatus.NAME: Late Start
${ModID}:LateStartStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When exhausted, gain 1 *Draw *Reduction.

${ModID}:NightOwlStatus.NAME: Night Owl
${ModID}:NightOwlStatus.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL When retained, a random card in your draw pile costs 1 more [E] to play this combat. Exhaust.

${ModID}:RushedStatus.NAME: Rushed
${ModID}:RushedStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. Whenever this card is drawn, lose [E] and draw 2 cards.

${ModID}:SlackerStatus.NAME: Slacker
${ModID}:SlackerStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. Whenever this card is drawn, worsen umapyoi:Mood by 1 rank, lose 1 Strength, and gain [E].

${ModID}:SlowMetabolismStatus.NAME: Slow Metabolism
${ModID}:SlowMetabolismStatus.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Dexterity and gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:LegFractureCurse.NAME: Fractured Leg
${ModID}:LegFractureCurse.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Unplayable. Retain. stslib:Soulbound. When Retained, worsen umapyoi:Mood by 1 rank. NL When exhausted, add a *Migraine, *Skin *Outbreak, and *Practice *Poor to the top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:SkinOutbreakCurse.NAME: Skin Outbreak
${ModID}:SkinOutbreakCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, worsen umapyoi:Mood by 1 rank and add 1 Burn to the discard pile.

${ModID}:PracticePoorCurse.NAME: Practice Poor
${ModID}:PracticePoorCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. When this card is exhausted, worsen umapyoi:Mood by 1 rank and shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:MigraineCurse.NAME: Migraine
${ModID}:MigraineCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, worsen umapyoi:Mood by 2 ranks.
